Plot: An action-comedy about a simple cook from Chandni Chowk mistaken for the reincarnation of an ancient peasant warrior Liu Shengh by residents of an oppressed Chinese village.
Title: Chandni Chowk to China
Writer: Rajat Arora (dialogue), Bohemia (lyrics), Kailash Kher (lyrics), Shridhar Raghavan
Actors: Akshay Kumar, Deepika Padukone, Mithun Chakraborty, Ranvir Shorey
tomatoConsensus: A thin plot is disguised by high octane dancing and action in this Bollywood crossover comedy.
